title: Napu - Matthew Portions (Print)
description: Napu is an Austronesian language spoken in the North Lore district of Central Sulawesi, Indonesia. Together with Bada and Behoa, it belongs to the Badaic subgroup.
provider: The British and Foreign Bible Society

language.name: Napu
language.area: Central Sulawesi, Lore Utara subdistrict, Napu Valley. 10 villages.
